targets.query: SELECT count(distinct("user")) FROM (SELECT first("read_rate") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'user') GROUP BY "user" fill(none)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(none)

SELECT count(distinct("client")) FROM (SELECT first("read_rate") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'client') GROUP BY "client" fill(none)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(none)
SELECT count(distinct("server")) FROM (SELECT first("read_rate") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') GROUP BY "server" fill(none)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets)
SELECT "$mode" FROM (SELECT sum("$metric_a") AS "user" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'user') GROUP BY time($buckets), "user" fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "user"
SELECT "$mode" FROM (SELECT sum("$metric_b") AS "user" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'user') GROUP BY time($buckets), "user" fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "user"
SELECT "$mode" FROM (SELECT sum("$metric_a") AS "client" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'client') GROUP BY time($buckets), "client" fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "client"
SELECT "$mode" FROM (SELECT sum("$metric_b") AS "client" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'client') GROUP BY time($buckets), "client" fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "client"
SELECT sum("read_bytes") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets), "server" fill(0)
SELECT sum("write_bytes") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets), "server" fill(0)
SELECT sum("read_bytes") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'total_server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)
SELECT sum("write_bytes") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'total_server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)
SELECT sum("reqs") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets), "server" fill(0)
SELECT sum("reqs") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'total_server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)

panels.title: $colo $name Node Total Data I/O Requests ($buckets buckets)

targets.query: SELECT "$show_bsy" FROM (SELECT sum("bsy") AS "Show" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "server"
SELECT "$show_qlen" FROM (SELECT sum("qlen") AS "Show" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "server"
SELECT "$show_bsy" FROM (SELECT sum("bsy") AS "Show" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'total_server') GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "$show_qlen" FROM (SELECT sum("qlen") AS "Show" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'total_server') GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter

panels.title: $colo $name Node Total Data I/O Busy/Queue-Length ($buckets buckets)

title: BeeGFS Total Data I/O by User/Client/Node
